section.title: Managing and Monitoring JAIN SLEE Deployable Units
View JAIN SLEE Deployable Unit Summary
section.para: At the top, under the summary section, some data regarding the Deployable Unit can be seen, such as the Type, Parent Component (JSLEE Server) and the date on which it was deployed. These are displayed in the Description.

section.title: Monitor JAIN SLEE DU Availability over time
section.para: Accessing the MONITOR tab, a graph showing the availability of the deployable unit over time can be seen.

figure.title: &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE Deployable Unit Availability View.

textobject.para: &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE Deployable Unit Availability View.

note.title: Deployable Unit Availability Feature
note.para: The Availability refers to whether the DU was or not installed. It only works for deployable units with the same name.

section.title: List Component IDs
section.para: Executing the List Component IDs will display the only available operation, IDs of the components

note.para: This operation can be scheduled for a later time and have a defined timeout and/or include additional notes.

section.para: Clicking on the SCHEDULE executes (if Immediately is selected) or schedules the operation. After being executed, it is shown in HISTORY, Completed Operations. Clicking on it shows the result(s).
